quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), which of the following ministries/organisations has organized ‘Poshan Utsav’?
options: NITI Aayog
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
Ministry of Education

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to 5th Assembly of the International Solar Alliance?

A.     Minister has unveiled the curtain to 3rd Assembly of ISA

B.      The deliberations are based on three critical issues viz, energy access, energy security, and energy transition.

C.      Three reports will be released after the assembly
options: B and C
A and B
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: International Solar Alliance was launched at the 21st session of the United Nations Climate Change Conference of the Parties (COP-21) in which of the following years?
options: 2019
2017
2015
2021
2014

quiz.text: Recently (Oct 2022), which of the following organisations/ministries has organized a National Workshop on “Accountability Framework: Responsibility of stakeholders on the implementation of School Safety guidelines with reference to Psycho-Social aspects”?
options: National Commission for Women (NCW)
National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR)
Ministry of Education
CBSE
NCERT

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Ministerial dialogue of US-India Strategic Clean Energy Partnership (USISCEP) has taken place. Which of the following SCEP pillars is incorrectly mentioned below?
options: Renewable Energy Pillar
Sustainable Growth Pillar
Power and Energy Efficiency Pillar
Responsible Oil and Gas Pillar
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to “Swachh Sagar, Surakshit Sagar” campaign?

A.     It was launched by Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

B.      It was launched at 75 beaches for 75 days with 75 volunteers

C.      Its target was to remove 1,500 tonnes of marine litter from the sea-coasts
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: The ‘Waste to Wealth’ Mission is one of the ________________national missions of the Prime Minister’s Science, Technology, and Innovation Advisory Council (PM-STIAC).
options: Four
Nine
Seven
Five
Ten

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the fellowship?

A.     The Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser invites applications for the award of SSF.

B.      School students from 9-12th standard are rewarded with Rs. 1000 per month for a year under the fellowship.

C.      Best performing fellow is recognised as the Swachta Saarthi of month.
options: A and B
B only
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) has directed commissioning of gas infrastructure in the entire National Capital Region (NCR) before the next winter season to fight air pollution. For this purpose, entire NCR has been divided into how many Geographical Areas?
options: 24
15
11
19
27

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), Union Minister of State for Health & Family Welfare has addressed the meeting of the High-Level Coalition on Health and Energy virtually.

Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the meeting?
options: It was the 2nd meeting of the High-Level Coalition on Health and Energy
Objective was to accelerate clean cooking and electrification of health-care facilities
It was convened by the Director General of World Health Organisation
The outcome of the meeting was “Call to Action to increase climate resilience of health-care facilities & air quality through sustainable energy”.
All of the above

quiz.text: Defence Accounts Department (DAD) celebrated its _____________ Annual Day celebrations in New Delhi on October 01, 2022.
options: 250th
275th
200th
300th
150th

quiz.text: Which of the following is the objective of SPARSH Mobile App?
options: ensure claim processing and pay-roll management of Agniveers under Agnipath scheme
ensure pensioner access and reach to important functionalities of the portal through their mobiles
unified solution for third party bill payment and accounting
The armed forces personnel can get real-time data related to pay & allowances and claims through this initiative
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following ministries/organisations has launched the campaign “Gunvatta Se Atmanirbharta: India’s quality movement”?
options: Bureau of Indian Standards
Quality Council of India
Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
NITI Aayog
Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, The Fifteenth Finance Commission has recommended a total Post Devolution Revenue Deficit Grant of _______________ to 14 States for the financial year 2022-23.
options: Rs. 96,201 crores
Rs. 76,201 crores
Rs. 89,201 crores
Rs. 67,201 crores
Rs. 86,201 crores

quiz.text: Post Devolution Revenue Deficit Grant is provided under which article of the constitution of India?
options: Article 324
Article 268
Article 224
Article 275
Article 356

quiz.text: As per recent (October 2022) news, which of the following countries has become the 2nd largest exporter of sugar in the world?
options: South Africa
Brazil
China
Cuba
India

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has extended existing concessional import duties on specified edible oils up to ______________.
options: March 31, 2023
December 31, 2022
June 30, 2023
April 30, 2023
October 31, 2023

quiz.text: Which of the following edible oil constitutes the maximum percentage of imports by India?
options: Soyabean Oil
Sunflower Oil
Palm Oil
Mustard Oil
Groundnut Oil

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the first ever Partners in the Blue Pacific (PBP) Foreign Ministers Meeting was held in New York, United States (US). Which of the following nation is not a part of the PBP?
options: India
Australia
New Zealand
USA
United Kingdom

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, UNWGIC 2022 will be organized by the ___________________ and hosted by the Government of India.
options: United Nations Development Program
Department of Economic and Social Affairs of the United Nations
World Economic Forum
World Bank
Asian Development Bank

quiz.text: As per the Union Minister of Science and Technology, India's geospatial economy is expected to cross Rs 63,100 crore by which of the following years at a growth rate of 12.8%?
options: 2030
2027
2035
2025
2023

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Kerala’s Pullampara grama panchayat in Thiruvananthapuram district has become the first ______________ panchayat in India.
options: fully solar powered
fully electrified
fully digitally literate
fully 5G connected
fully ODF plus

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following organisations has framed guidelines allowing students to pursue two academic degrees (Full-time) simultaneously?
options: All India Council for Technical Education
National Assessment and Accreditation Council
National Board of Accreditation
UGC (University Grants Commission)
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), nearly 1 million TB (Tuberculosis) patients have been adopted in less than a month under Nikshay Mitra initiative. Under this initiative TB patients can be supported from a period of 6 months up to ______________.
options: 2 years
5 years
1 year
3 years
None of the above

quiz.text: Ni-Kshay Portal has been developed and maintained by which of the following organisations?
options: Central TB Division (CTD)
National Informatics Centre (NIC)
WHO office of India
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Central Government is considering leasing out its ocean floor straddling Tamil Nadu to offshore wind farms. The government had notified a National Offshore Wind Energy Policy in which of the following years?
options: 2017
2015
2014
2019
2021

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, SBI has announced that it will adopt 30 remote villages across 6 states under the ___________ phase of the ‘SBI Gram Seva program’.
options: 2nd
4th
3rd
8th
6th

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to SBI Gram Seva program?
options: It was launched in 2019
It emphasises on comprehensive development of villages
Program’s outreach has been expanded to a total of 130 villages
75 villages are from Aspirational Districts notified by the NITI Aayog
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), ‘Green Fins Hub’- the first ever global marine tourism industry platform has been launched. It is an initiative of which of the following organisations?
options: United Nations Environmental Programme (UNEP)
Reef-World Foundation
World Wide Fund for Nature
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: The Government of India would be soon launching a USD 1 billion fund to offer guarantees against defaults on loans taken to buy electric two or three-wheelers in collaboration with which of the following organisations?
options: World Bank
Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
Asian Development Bank
New Development Bank
1 and 2

quiz.text: What was the theme of the 77th Session of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA)?
options: Making the United Nations relevant to all people
A Watershed Moment: Transformative Solutions to Interlocking Challenges
Striving together, delivering for all
Focusing on People: Striving for Peace and a Decent Life for All on a Sustainable Planet
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following country is not a part of G4 Nations?
options: Brazil
Germany
India
South Africa
Japan

quiz.text: As per the information shared at the recently (October 2022) held Digital India Conference of State IT Ministers, how much amount has been approved to install new 25,000 towers in next 500 days?
options: Rs 6,000 crores
Rs 26,000 crores
Rs 11,000 crores
Rs 20,000 crores
Rs 16,000 crores

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Department of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare has signed an MoU with which of the following organizations to boost International Year of Millets (IYOM)-2023?
options: NABARD
NAFED
FAO
ICAR
CSIR

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, NABARD has sanctioned Rs 221.99 crore to strengthen school infrastructure in rural schools in ______________.
options: Odisha
West Bengal
Punjab
Assam
Bihar

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to RIDF?

A.     Government of India (GoI) created the RIDF in NABARD in 1995-96.

B.      It was created with an initial corpus of Rs. 2,000 crores.

C.      At present, there are 20 eligible activities under RIDF as approved by GoI
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) has issued India's first micro category drone type certification to Asteria Aerospace Limited for its locally developed A200 drone. Drones weighing from 250 gram to _____________ fall under the micro category of drones.
options: 2 kg
5 kg
1 kg
10 kg
4 kg

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), according to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), India's forex reserves have declined to over two-year low of _________________.
options: USD 512.66 Billion
USD 532.66 Billion
USD 592.66 Billion
USD 612.66 Billion
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Department of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare has signed an MoU with which of the following organizations to boost International Year of Millets (IYOM)-2023?
options: NABARD
NAFED
FAO
ICAR
CSIR
